INDEX_ON_FTS_SUCCESS: Indexing on global search engine was successful
TO_SELECT_ADD_PRODUCTS_YOU_MUST_SEARCH_A: To select add product(s), you must search and choose one or more products
MANAGEMENT_AND_CONSULTATION_OF_OFFER_FAM: Management and consultation of offer families
CLICK_ON_THE_ADD_FAMILY_BUTTON_TO_START_: Click on the 'Add Family' button to start the process of registering an offer family
CLICK_ON_THE_IMPORT_PRODUCT_BUTTON_TO_ST: Click on the 'Import Products' button to start the process of loading your products
NO_FAMILY_FOUND_TRY_CHANGING_YOUR_SEARCH: No families found, try changing your search criteria
THESE_ARE_THE_IMAGES_AVAILABLE_FOR_THE_P: These are the images available for the product, if you want you can upload new images, just select them on your computer or drag the image to the location
THESE_ARE_THE_IMAGES_AVAILABLE_FOR_THE_F: These are the images available for the family, if you want you can upload new images, just select them on your computer or drag the image to the location
THIS_IS_THE_DESCRIPTION_THAT_WILL_BE_USE: This is the description that will be used as a highlight in campaigns and posters, it can be adjusted to be more customer friendly
THIS_IS_A_DESCRIPTION_THAT_CAN_BE_USED_A: This is a description that can be used as part of the main description, but with less prominence, it can also be adjusted
YOU_CHANGED_INFORMATION_BUT_DID_NOT_SAVE: You changed information but did not save, exiting will not save edits
THE_IMAGE_BANK_FOR_YOU_TO_TRANSFORM_YOUR: The image bank for you to transform your business
KEEP_YOUR_PRODUCT_IMAGES_ALWAYS_UP_TO_DA: Keep your product images always up to date
TRY_DOING_A_NEW_SEARCH_OR_REGISTER_A_NEW: Try doing a new search or register a new product/family
